aside.p: Continue polishing questions so that they have a success post-question phase, the game-choice boxes are properly checked, and some minor formatting issues managed. Remove the history matrix, as this information is already captured in the graphs. A significant bug has been ferreted out and fixed related to counting players for round advancement. This was found by the bots, which now can selectively enable compression to reduce load.

Add a new view for administrators: the projected number of participants over the rounds. Also lift the restriction that administrator e-mail information must be set: if the e-mail is not set, emails are not sent. This is reflected in the administrator instructions.
